text: Chen Zhibin (born 21 October 1962) is a male Chinese former international table tennis player and current coach. He won a bronze medal at the 1989 World Table Tennis Championships in the mixed doubles with Gao Jun. In 2000, Chen Zhibin became a German citizen and represented Germany. From 2011-2014 he worked as national coach in the Netherlands for the women's and since 2016 he has been the national coach of the women's team in Singapore. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== ==External links== * Category:Naturalised table tennis players Category:Table tennis players from Xinjiang Category:Chinese male table tennis players Category:German male table tennis players Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Asian Games medalists in table tennis Category:Table tennis players at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists Category:German table tennis coaches
title: Chen Zhibin
